title: Spectral Toolkit of Algorithms for Graphs: Technical Report (1). (arXiv:2304.03170v1 [cs.SI])
abstract: Spectral Toolkit of Algorithms for Graphs (STAG) is an open-source library for efficient spectral graph algorithms, and its development starts in September 2022. We have so far finished the component on local graph clustering, and this technical report presents a user's guide to STAG, showcase studies, and several technical considerations behind our development.
context:
Title: Spectral Toolkit of Algorithms for Graphs: Technical Report (1). (arXiv:2304.03170v1 [cs.SI])
Abstract: Spectral Toolkit of Algorithms for Graphs (STAG) is an open-source library for efficient spectral graph algorithms, and its development starts in September 2022. We have so far finished the component on local graph clustering, and this technical report presents a user's guide to STAG, showcase studies, and several technical considerations behind our development.
translated_title: 图谱算法的频谱工具包：技术报告（1）
translated_abstract: 图谱算法的频谱工具包（STAG）是一个用于高效频谱图算法的开源库，其开发始于2022年9月。我们目前已经完成了本地图聚类的组件，并且本技术报告介绍了STAG的用户指南、展示研究以及我们开发背后的几个技术考虑。
tldr: 频谱工具包STAG是一个开源库，用于实现高效的频谱图算法，其中还包括本地图聚类组件。此技术报告介绍了STAG的用户指南、展示研究以及开发背后的技术考虑。
en_tdlr: The Spectral Toolkit of Algorithms for Graphs (STAG) is an open-source library for efficient spectral graph algorithms that includes a local graph clustering component. This technical report provides a user's guide to STAG, showcase studies, and technical considerations behind its development.
